readable.title: 2429729667_42effc165d
readable.content: A girl has her head in a wooden cut out of a pirate ship while people throw tomatos . A little girl throws an object at a man who is standing behind a cutout of a sailor on a ship . A young boy and girl are trying to hit a man with balls in a fair game . Children are throwing food at someone as part of an amusement park game . Children watching a play .
